short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A brewery finder using geolocation. Uses the Open Brewery DB API: https://www.openbrewerydb.org/.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using your current geolocation, will list breweries near you, from closest to furthest away. Provides brewery name, address, phone, and website link.
